item.title: 中东风险缓解，科技股反弹，S&P 500 指数跃升至创纪录水平
item.description: 随着关税和地缘政治忧虑的消散，美国 500 指数周四有望创下历史新高；这一令人惊叹的复苏为两个月前还处于熊市边缘的美国股市增加了近 10 万亿美元。【原文：The S&P 500 Index is on track to close at an all-time high on Thursday as tariff and geopolitical concerns dissipate — capping a stunning recovery that has added almost $10 trillion to US stocks which were on the cusp of a bear market just two months ago.】

item.title: 随着米莱优惠政策的结束，农作物贸易商急于确保阿根廷货物的安全
item.description: 阿根廷的农产品贸易商正赶着在哈维尔-米莱伊总统的关税减免措施下周到期前将农作物装船入账。【原文：Agriculture traders in Argentina are rushing to get crop shipments on the books before President Javier Milei’s tariff relief expires next week.】

item.title: 墨西哥监管机构介入管理遭美国指控的银行
item.description: 墨西哥银行监管机构表示，在美国当局指控 CIBanco SA 和 Intercam Banco SA 可能为贩毒集团洗钱提供便利之后，该机构将临时介入管理这两家公司，以保护客户的利益。【原文：Mexico’s bank regulator said it was temporarily stepping in to run CIBanco SA and Intercam Banco SA in a bid to protect customers following accusations by US authorities that the firms were potentially facilitating money laundering by drug cartels.】

item.title: 美联储主席柯林斯称 7 月降息可能为时尚早
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行行长苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）表示，她认为今年至少会有一次降息，但她表示 7 月份降息为时尚早。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Boston President Susan Collins said she sees at least one interest-rate cut this year, but indicated July would be too early for such a move.】

item.title: 特朗普移动公司从网站上撤下 "美国制造 "智能手机的说法
item.description: 特朗普移动公司（Trump Mobile）是特朗普组织（Trump Organization）上周推出的一家新的手机服务企业，该公司已经删除了最初承诺其首款手机 T1 Phone 将在美国生产的网上参考资料。【原文：Trump Mobile, the new cellular service venture introduced by the Trump Organization last week, has scrubbed online references that originally promised its first mobile handset, the T1 Phone, would be produced in the US.】

item.title: 纽约市债券投资者平息华尔街对马姆达尼崛起的忧虑
item.description: 纽约市市长候选人佐赫兰-马姆达尼（Zohran Mamdani）计划提高对富人的税收、冻结房租并增加支出以支付免费托儿服务和市公立大学的教育费用，这让华尔街感到震惊。【原文：New York City mayoral hopeful Zohran Mamdani has rattled Wall Street with his plans to raise taxes on the rich, freeze rents and boost spending to pay for free childcare and education at the city’s public universities.】

item.title: 卢斌考虑为以太坊财务公司 Sharplink 增加杠杆作用
item.description: 以太坊联合创始人乔-卢宾（Joe Lubin）表示，他可能会向 Sharplink Gaming Inc.【原文：Ethereum co-founder Joe Lubin said that he might introduce leverage to Sharplink Gaming Inc., the sports betting and gaming technology firm that recently turned into an Ether treasury company, which Lubin serves as chairman.】

item.title: Meta 正在洽谈收购人工智能语音初创公司 PlayAI，以争夺人才
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司正在就收购 PlayAI 进行深入谈判，PlayAI 是一家利用人工智能复制声音的小型初创公司。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is in advanced talks to acquire PlayAI, a small startup using artificial intelligence to replicate voices, part of the social media company’s push to nab top talent and catch up in the AI race.】

item.title: 白宫称特朗普不会立即决定下任美联储主席人选
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，唐纳德-特朗普可能最快在今年夏天做出美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔继任者人选的决定。【原文：The White House said Donald Trump’s decision on a successor for Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell is not near, after the Wall Street Journal reported the president could make a pick as soon as the summer.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会启动对高管薪酬和福利规则的审查
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）正在采取初步措施，考虑全面修订高管薪酬（包括银行家薪酬和奖金扣回）的披露规则。【原文：The Securities and Exchange Commission is taking initial steps to consider overhauling rules governing disclosures of executive compensation, including banker pay and bonus clawbacks.】

item.title: 美国稀土提炼商 Phoenix Tailings 计划三年内上市
item.description: 美国金属精炼商 Phoenix Tailings 计划在建厂生产汽车、医疗设备和军事装备所需的稀土元素后，在三年内进行首次公开募股。【原文：US metals refiner Phoenix Tailings plans to pursue an initial public offering within three years after building out plants to produce rare earth elements to go into automobiles, medical devices and military equipment.】

item.title: Core Scientific 因 CoreWeave 收购谈判报道而反弹
item.description: 据报道，CoreWeave 公司正在讨论收购数据中心运营商 Core Scientific 公司，随后该公司股价大涨 32%。【原文：Core Scientific Inc. shares surged as much as 32% following a report that CoreWeave Inc. is in discussions to acquire the operator of data centers.】

item.title: 中东冲突减弱，油轮运价下跌
item.description: 周四，向亚洲客户运输中东原油的成本下降，这是世界头号石油出口地区冲突缓和后石油市场恢复正常的最新迹象。【原文：The cost of shipping Middle East crude to customers in Asia collapsed on Thursday, the latest sign of oil markets returning to normal after conflict eased in the world’s top petroleum-exporting region.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率连续第四周下跌，跌至 6.77
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率连续四周下降。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US fell for a fourth straight week.】

item.title: 英国金融科技巨头 Revolut 将收购法国巴黎银行在阿根廷的 Cetelem 公司
item.description: 据两位直接知情人士透露，欧洲最大的数字银行 Revolut Ltd. 正在收购阿根廷的 Banco Cetelem，这是一家由法国巴黎银行控股的小型地方贷款机构。【原文：Revolut Ltd., Europe’s largest digital bank, is acquiring Argentina’s Banco Cetelem, a small local lender owned by BNP Paribas, according to two people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 大多数美联储官员倾向于反对七月降息
item.description: 本周，美联储的一众官员明确表示，他们还需要几个月的时间才能获得信心，相信关税驱动的价格上涨不会持续加剧通胀。【原文：A flurry of Federal Reserve officials this week made clear they’ll need a few more months to gain confidence that tariff-driven price hikes won’t raise inflation in a persistent way.】

item.title: 华尔街全力追捧高风险股票
item.description: 随着 S&P 500 指数逼近历史新高，投资者纷纷涌入投机性和波动性较强的股市，将谨慎抛到九霄云外。【原文：Investors are piling into speculative and volatile edges of the stock market, throwing caution to the wind as the S&P 500 Index closes in on a new all-time high.】

item.title: 杰斐逊资本底价 1.5 亿美元首次公开募股后上涨 27
item.description: Jefferson Capital Inc. 公司及其部分支持者在首次公开募股中筹集了 1.5 亿美元，首次公开募股后股价涨幅高达 27%。【原文：Jefferson Capital Inc. shares rose as much as 27% in its public debut after the company and some of its backers raised $150 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 秘鲁铜矿投资者最担心非正规采矿业的蓬勃发展
item.description: 据秘鲁主要行业协会（SNMPE）负责人称，秘鲁开采更多巨型铜矿所面临的最大威胁是非正规和非法采矿活动的增加。【原文：The biggest threat to Peru tapping more of its giant copper deposits is rising informal and illegal mining activity, according to the head of the country’s main industry association, SNMPE.】

item.title: 赞比亚 2025 年将从国内市场额外借款 6.24 亿美元
item.description: 赞比亚财政部长西图姆贝科-穆索科特瓦内（Situmbeko Musokotwane）表示，赞比亚将从国内市场额外借款148亿克瓦查（约合6.24亿美元），以弥补今年预算中超出预期的缺口。【原文：Zambia will borrow an additional 14.8 billion kwacha ($624 million) from the domestic market to cover a bigger-than-expected shortfall in this year’s budget, Finance Minister Situmbeko Musokotwane said.】

item.title: 尼日利亚总统蒂努布签署新税法，迈出改革新步伐
item.description: 尼日利亚总统博拉-蒂努布（Bola Tinubu）签署了四项新税法，标志着他推动非洲人口最多国家经济改革的最新进展。【原文：Nigerian President Bola Tinubu has signed four new tax laws, marking the latest chapter in his push to reform the economy of Africa’s most populous nation.】

item.title: 国际米兰新增 3.5 亿欧元私人债务用于偿还债券
item.description: 国际米兰足球俱乐部（FC Internazionale Milano SpA）向机构投资者配售了 3.5 亿欧元（约合 4.1 亿美元）的私人债务，从而获得了偿还当前债券持有人的资金。【原文：FC Internazionale Milano SpA has placed €350 million ($410 million) of private debt with institutional investors, granting it the funds to repay current bondholders.】

item.title: 世贸组织称关税担忧加速进口，全球货物贸易增长
item.description: 在世界贸易组织的最新评估中，全球商品贸易加速增长，与关税囤积有关的进口激增超过了出口订单的放缓。【原文：Global merchandise trade accelerated in the World Trade Organization’s latest assessment, with a surge in imports tied to tariff stockpiling outweighing a slowdown in export orders.】

item.title: 特朗普的加密货币项目从阿联酋基金获得 1 亿美元投资
item.description: 一家鲜为人知的加密货币基金购买了 1 亿美元的世界自由金融公司（World Liberty Financial Inc.【原文：A little known crypto fund bought $100 million of World Liberty Financial Inc. tokens, the second Middle East-based investor to put money into the Trump family affiliated decentralized finance platform.】

item.title: 德国最大的天然气储存库仍空无一物，尽管已努力进行填充
item.description: 德国最大的天然气储存设施在最近一次拍卖中未能分配容量，这增加了德国在冬季到来之前难以达到具有法律约束力的储存目标的风险。【原文：Germany’s largest gas storage facility failed to allocate capacity at its latest auction, raising risks that the country will struggle to meet legally binding stockpiling targets ahead of winter.】

item.title: 艾伯塔省原住民称数据中心限制将阻碍人工智能蓬勃发展
item.description: 加拿大艾伯塔省的原住民社区正在反击各种限制，他们认为这些限制阻碍了对人工智能发展所需的新数据中心的投资。【原文：Indigenous communities in Canada’s Alberta province are pushing back on restrictions they say hinder investment in new data centers needed to power the growth of artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 不可能食品公司力争今年将植物汉堡列入欧洲菜单
item.description: 不可能食品公司（Impossible Foods Inc.【原文：Impossible Foods Inc. is set to add its plant-based burgers to European menus this year, ending a six-year quest to enter the world’s biggest market for meat alternatives.】

item.title: 小米推出售价 3.5 万美元的 SUV，将在中国挑战特斯拉 Model Y
item.description: 中国智能手机制造商小米公司（Xiaomi Corp. ）推出了一款售价 253,500 元（合 35,360 美元）的运动型多功能车，瞄准了特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Chinese smartphone maker Xiaomi Corp. is looking to shake off scrutiny of tech-enhanced driving systems with a 253,500 yuan ($35,360) sport utility vehicle that takes aim at Tesla Inc.’s popular Model Y.】

item.title: 72 亿美元的新兴市场基金加大地方债务赌注
item.description: 全球最大的新兴市场债券共同基金经理正在大肆收购本币债券，押注美元的持续下跌远未结束。【原文：A manager of the world’s largest mutual fund dedicated to emerging-market bonds is scooping up local currency debt, betting the dollar’s persistent decline is far from over.】
